item.title: Error Handling in GitHub Workflow Extensions
item.description: I recently created my first community plugin for Obsidian, which has basic functions for practicing pronunciation. After submitting it, I received feedback from a reviewer suggesting I change the pluginâ€™s name because its features are more focused on the pronunciation of selected text.
